introduction.introductionText:
It's now time to see if you can say the words. Press the "push to speak" button and say them correctly.
Giờ là lúc để xem bạn có thể nói các từ đã học không. Nhấn nút "push to speak" và nói chính xác chúng.

l10n.noSound: I could not hear you, make sure your microphone is enabled
l10n.unsupportedBrowserHeader: It looks like your browser does not support speech recognition
l10n.unsupportedBrowserDetails: Please try again in a browser like Chrome
l10n.a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
l10n.a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
